paramInformation.label: Battery report
paramInformation.description: When battery power change value is over the threshold value, send Battery Report to Lifeline.

paramInformation.label: Motion Pulses
paramInformation.description: Sets the number of moves required for the PIR sensor to report motion. The more the value is, the less sensitive it is.

paramInformation.label: Motion Window Time
paramInformation.description: The amount of time the movements specified in parameter #5 need to take place in. The higher the value, the more sensitive the PIR sensor.

paramInformation.label: Motion Alarm Cancellation Delay
paramInformation.description: Amount of time the alarm will be canceled after.

paramInformation.label: BASIC Command Class Configuration
paramInformation.description: Determines the command frames sent to 1st association group.

paramInformation.label: Motion - BASIC ON command sent to 2nd assoc group

options.label: Setting assoc device to last value or ON

paramInformation.label: Motion - BASIC OFF command sent to 2nd assoc group

options.label: Setting assoc device to last value or ON

paramInformation.label: Motion Day/Night Mode
paramInformation.description: The parameter determines the part of day in which the PIR sensor will be active.

options.label: PIR sensor active during the day only
PIR sensor active during the night only

paramInformation.label: Night/Day Threshold
paramInformation.description: The parameter defines the difference between night and day.

paramInformation.label: Illumination Report Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval between consecutive illumination reports.

paramInformation.label: Illuminance Report Threshold
paramInformation.description: Minimum change in light intensity level resulting in illumination report, value 0 threshold disabled

paramInformation.label: Association Secure Mode
paramInformation.description: Determines how commands are sendt in spesified association groups

paramInformation.label: Temperature/Humidity Report Interval
paramInformation.description: The parameter determines how often the Temperature/Humidity will be measured.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Report Threshold
paramInformation.description: The change (1=0.1째C) in temperature resulting in report, value 0 threshold disabled

paramInformation.label: Humidity Report Threshold
paramInformation.description: The change in Humidity resulting in report, value 0 threshold disabled

paramInformation.label: Temperature Offset
paramInformation.description: The value (1=0.1째C) to be added to the actual measured temperature.

paramInformation.label: Humidity Offset
paramInformation.description: The value to be added to the actual measured humidity.

metadata.inclusion: Triple press the action button, the sensor will be set to inclusion mode
metadata.exclusion: Triple press the action button, the sensor will be set to exclusion mode
metadata.reset: Press and hold down action button for over 10 seconds, then LED indicator will flash 3 times slowly to indicate successful factory reset, the sensor will be removed from the network and reset to factory defaults.
